fees_and_charges.renewal_fee: Renewal Fee waiver for next year on spends of Rs. 3 Lakhs in card anniversary year

credit_details.revolving_credit: Available at a nominal interest rate

earning_structure: 4 Reward Points for every Rs. 150 spent
5X Reward Points on Swiggy and Zomato
Upto 10X Rewards on Booking flight tickets / stays

welcome_benefits.benefit_name: Complimentary Annual Memberships of Swiggy One and Times Prime
welcome_benefits.description: Avail on spending Rs 75,000 within the first 90 days of card issuance

milestone_benefits.milestone_name: ₹ 1,500 worth vouchers on quarterly spends of Rs. 1.5 lakh
milestone_benefits.description: Avail vouchers of Marriott, Decathlon & more
milestone_benefits.spending_requirement: Rs. 1.5 lakh in a calendar quarter

lounge_access.domestic: 2 Complimentary Airport lounge access every calendar quarter worldwide
lounge_access.international: 2 Complimentary Airport lounge access every calendar quarter worldwide

dining_entertainment_benefits.benefit_name: Buy 1 Get 1 Free on movie/non-movie weekend tickets via BookMyShow
dining_entertainment_benefits.description: Applicable for shows on Friday, Saturday, and Sunday
dining_entertainment_benefits.discount_value: Maximum discount of Rs. 250/ticket, upto 2 free tickets every calendar month
dining_entertainment_benefits.conditions: Specific days and booking conditions apply

dining_entertainment_benefits.benefit_name: 5X Reward Points on Swiggy and Zomato
dining_entertainment_benefits.description: Additional 4X RP is capped at 2500 reward points every calendar month
dining_entertainment_benefits.conditions: Capped at 2500 reward points every calendar month

other_benefits: Contactless Payment: Enabled for contactless payments
Smart EMI: Option to convert big spends into EMI
Exclusive Offers: Fast Track Airport Experience, Dining Delight, Luxury Spas, SME offers
Customer Care: HDFC Phone Banking - 1800 1600 / 1800 2600, Smartbuy Concierge - 1860 425 1188

terms_and_conditions.offer_terms: Specific terms apply to each offer
terms_and_conditions.fee_terms: Joining/ Renewal Membership Fee – Rs. 1000/- + Applicable Taxes
terms_and_conditions.reward_terms: Specific terms apply to reward points and redemption

summary: HDFC Diners Club Privilege is a premium credit card offering a range of benefits including lounge access, milestone rewards, and exclusive dining offers.

offers.title: Buy 1 Get 1 Free on BookMyShow
offers.description: Avail Buy 1 Get 1 Free on movie/non-movie weekend tickets via BookMyShow
offers.discount_value: Maximum discount of Rs. 250/ticket, upto 2 free tickets every calendar month
terms_conditions: Specific days and booking conditions apply

offers.title: 5X Reward Points on Swiggy and Zomato
offers.description: Earn 5X Reward Points on Swiggy and Zomato. Additional 4X RP is capped at 2500 reward points every calendar month
offers.maximum_benefit: Capped at 2500 reward points every calendar month
